/usr/bin/c++  -g   CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/AppHttpHandler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/AppHardwareHandler.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/SmartPot.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/NotificationCenter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/smart_pot.dir/src/MqttClientHandler.cpp.o  -o smart_pot  -lpthread -lpistache -lpaho-mqttpp3 -lpaho-mqtt3as
